pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyTorch Yard - PyTorch experiment runner========================================Work in progress.Requires manual installation of hydra-torch configs:- hydra-configs-torch @ git+https://github.com/pytorch/hydra-torch/#subdirectory=hydra-configs-torch- hydra-configs-torchvision @ git+https://github.com/pytorch/hydra-torch/#subdirectory=hydra-configs-torchvision:: pip install git+https://github.com/pytorch/hydra-torch/#subdirectory=hydra-configs-torch git+https://github.com/pytorch/hydra-torch/#subdirectory=hydra-configs-torchvision
